meanings.definition: (adjective) Thrown or held with the arm extended to the side.
meanings.sent1: He sidearmed the ball to first base during the game.
meanings.sent2: The pitcher sidearmed the ball to confuse the batter.
meanings.sent3: The sidearmed throw looked funny but was surprisingly accurate.
meanings.sent4: Her sidearmed shot at the target hit the bullseye.
meanings.sent5: The sidearmed pass was so smooth, it impressed everyone watching.

meanings.definition: (adverb) In a manner where the arm is extended to the side.
meanings.sent1: She threw the ball sidearmed, aiming for the target.
meanings.sent2: The player swung sidearmed, trying to hit the ball far.
meanings.sent3: He walked sidearmed, pretending to be a robot.
meanings.sent4: The dancer moved sidearmed across the stage gracefully.
meanings.sent5: The superhero fought sidearmed, ready to defend against any attack.
